</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/variants/germline/{locus_id}/cases/count"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve cases count for a given locus id

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Locus ID","in":"path","name":"locus_id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"count_interpreted":{"type":"integer"},"count_uninterpreted":{"type":"integer"}},"required":["count_interpreted","count_uninterpreted"],"type":"object","title":"VariantCasesCount"}}},"description":"OK"},"404":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"ApiError represents an error","properties":{"detail":{},"message":{"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"integer"}},"required":["message","status"],"type":"object","title":"ApiError"}}},"description":"Not Found"},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"ApiError represents an error","properties":{"detail":{},"message":{"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"integer"}},"required":["message","status"],"type":"object","title":"ApiError"}}},"description":"Internal Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
